    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpielfeldView(double sizeFieldX, double sizeFieldY, int tilesPerRow, int tilesPerCol, SpielfeldModel sm, MarkerWindow markerWindow)
      initialize a field of given size for given model sizeFieldX => Stack width sizeFieldY => Stack height tilesPerRow => rectangle per row, may be null for model.getType() == GridType.NONE tilesPerCol => rectangle per column, may be null for model.getType() == GridType.NONE || GridType.Hex model => the data model of the field to display
